aeropress.name: The Aeropress
aeropress.description: The AeroPress is a compact, versatile coffee maker that uses air pressure to brew smooth, rich coffee in just 1-2 minutes. Perfect for experimenting with flavors and easy to clean.

frenchpress.name: The French Press
frenchpress.description: The French Press brews bold, full-bodied coffee by steeping grounds in hot water and pressing them with a metal filter. It's a classic favorite for its rich, robust flavor.

pourover.name: The Pour Over
pourover.description: The pour-over method is a classic coffee brewing technique that involves pouring hot water over coffee grounds in a filter, allowing the water to drip through into a carafe or mug. This method emphasizes control over brewing variables, resulting in a clean, bright cup of coffee with nuanced flavors. Popular pour-over devices include the Hario V60 and Chemex.
